body:
To be entirely correct, a compiler from a module should include a
'modules:' field in its entry in the compilers.yaml file.  By default,
spack doesn't add this field automatically, so add a note about adding
it manually.

----------

This is a followup to Issue #9376.  This confused me for a long time
where I thought that --dirty was the only workaround.  So, I thought
that an note about an explicit manual step made sense.
title: docs: add note about compilers with modules
